briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Insulin Lispro Versus Insulin Aspart in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes on Insulin Pump Therapy
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Crossover Trial Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Insulin Lispro With the Safety and Efficacy of Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes on CSII Therapy
summary: This study will provide information on the use of insulin lispro and insulin aspart in insulin pumps in participants with type 2 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: After 16 weeks of each treatment (Periods1 and 2)
